School Closed - See Distance Learning Resource Hub
The District Office will be open Monday though Friday from 8:00 am - 12:00 pm

div.p: World Class Education with a Small Town Feel

p.span: This week our Food Service program received another donation of Girl Scout Cookies! Thank you too the 2 troops for their very generous...
Class of 2020... We are truly proud of your resilience and perseverance through this very difficult time. You are an outstanding class!
Reminder - School Bus Spirit Week kicks off tomorrow, Monday April 27. When receiving your meals, lets see those CrAzY SoCkS!
So thankful for our community supporters! This is what our school meals look like before they go out to students. Thank you again Dick's...
